headline: Show HN: Visualizing Code in Virtual and Augmented Reality
description:
Thanks for peeking in to this post.

I have been an avid fan of the push in the recent years for true visualization of code. If one searches HN for "visualization", more than 10 years of links, articles, documents, research, and projects come up with all sorts of wonderful metaphors for seeing your code in new ways.

I am a much simpler, much dumber man. I just wanted to see the code - literally, like long sheets of paper - floating in air so I could walk up to it and just.. interact with it. Move it. See what its next to. Then, maybe, use the same tools that present the code to me in this new way to introspect it visually, without relying on complicated or impossible hard-form algorithms that can do things like "show me related entries" or "all the classes that have function Z". Reducing the complexity of that question and answer down to "look to your right and left for the things that are now highlighted in purple" is my goal here.

To that end, I have an incredibly amateurish video to share with the group - pardon that it is a massive video file hosted on my private Proton Drive account. (If anyone has a suggestion or hosting videos that HN appreciates, I'll gladly take it!) It's about 6 minutes long, and is a basic demo of the project I have working on that tackles the things I mentioned above.

I'm posting this to HN because I need help. Motivational help, implementation help, and everything in between. I am absolutely convinced there are like minded people interested in ideas like this floating around the community, and it is to them (you!) that I am reaching out.

To all the above I also say: I appreciate your patience and willingness to hear an amateur software developer out.

headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 在虚拟和增强现实中实现代码的可视化
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 在虛擬和增強現實中實現代碼的可視化
description_zh-Hans:
谢谢你偷看这个帖子。

近年来，我一直热衷于推动代码的真正可视化。如果在HN中搜索"可视化"，超过10年的链接、文章、文档、研究和项目都提出了各种奇妙的隐喻，让你以新的方式看到你的代码。

我是一个更简单、更笨的人。我只想看到代码--从字面上看，就像长长的纸片--漂浮在空中，这样我就可以走到它面前，然后......与它互动。移动它。看看它旁边是什么。然后，也许，使用同样的工具，以这种新的方式向我展示代码，对它进行视觉上的内省，而不依赖于复杂的或不可能的硬形式的算法，这些算法可以做诸如"显示我的相关条目"或"所有具有函数Z的类"的事情。

为此，我有一个非常业余的视频要与大家分享--请原谅，这是一个存放在我的私人质子驱动器账户上的巨大视频文件。(如果有人有建议或HN欣赏的托管视频，我很乐意接受！) 它大约有6分钟长，是我正在进行的项目的基本演示，解决了我上面提到的问题。

我把这个贴到HN上是因为我需要帮助。激励的帮助，实施的帮助，以及两者之间的一切。我绝对相信，在这个社区中，有一些志同道合的人对这样的想法感兴趣，而我正是向他们（你们！）伸出援手。

对于上述所有人，我也要说。我感谢你的耐心和愿意听取一个业余软件开发者的意见。

https://drive.protonmail.com/urls/7NH8Y81Y9C#SlPidzB4EF0t
